title: Killers Amongst Us: Beautiful Blonde Mom Breaks into Politics, MURDERED! (part 4)
itunes:title: Killers Amongst Us: Beautiful Blonde Mom Breaks into Politics, MURDERED! (part 4)
description:
Linda Collins-Smith's family speaks out after her body is found. Her son says his last memory of his mother is her hair moving because of the number of maggots on her body. But who killed the former lawmaker? An investigation turns up a suspect close to home.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
